17 children murdered like my son.

(4/6) https://t.co/ijlbyqnEWU

Terrified children, marched with their hands up, streaming out of the high school.

Parents reading texts from their kids trapped inside that read, ‚Äúif I don‚Äôt make it, I love you, and I appreciated everything you did for me.‚Äù

(3/6)

On that day, my sadness turned to horror and grief.

My heart ached as I watched the news at Marjory Stoneman Douglas.

(2/6)

‚ÄúA reasonable plan to control drug prices #ForThePeople is sitting on Mitch McConnell‚Äôs desk. If Republicans wanted to do something to help the American people, they would bring it to the floor.‚Äù -Dr. Jamie Weisman #StateofHealthCare

‚ÄúWe are in a health care crisis of our own making. These medications are the difference between life and death. And, as in my father‚Äôs case, the price tag is almost unbearable.‚Äù #StateOfHealthCare

‚ÄúMedicare Part D explicitly prohibits Medicare from negotiating drug prices with pharmaceutical companies. As a result, Americans pay far higher prices for medications than any other country.‚Äù #StateOfHealthCare

‚ÄúThe costs of these drugs are so high that people, like my father, become part of a system that cares more about profit than patients. As he struggled for his life, he worried what he would be able to leave for my mother." #StateOfHealthCare

‚ÄúI‚Äôm attending the #SOTU with Rep. McBath. As a doctor and a patient, I know that in three years we‚Äôve made zero progress on controlling runaway drug prices and the suffering of patients goes unchecked.‚Äù #StateOfHealthCare

I‚Äôm proud to welcome Dr. Jamie Weisman from Sandy Springs as my guest for tonight‚Äôs #SOTU to shine a light on our fight to improve the #StateOfHealthCare #ForThePeople.
